nodes.text: The Business Merger was a short story written by Peter M. Schweighofer and published in the Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook.

Black Sun Vigo Sprax is ushered before Prince Xizor and given instructions to have a RenTrans bulk freighter, by the name of Doriella's Mystress, sabotaged. Xizor plans for this act to force the Rendar family, the owner of RenTrans, to re-consider merging their shipping company into Xizor Transport Systems.
